title: Keir Starmer – 2024 New Year’s Message
author: admin
summary: The message issued by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 1 January 2024.
content:
On behalf of the Labour Party, I’d like to wish you all a Happy New Year.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
